Content: Three persons have died following electrocution. The incident has occurred in the Thalahagama as at Gonakamulla in Akuressa. They have died due to an illegal electric cable. The Office of the Police Media Spokesman said that inquiries have been launched following information received by the Akuressa Police. The deceased are all males aged 45, 56 and 76. All of them are residents of Thalahagama. The electrocution had taken place at around 7.30 this morning.
